content:
I can recommend some popular social media listening tools you can consider:

1. hootsuite insights: this tool allows you to monitor social media conversations, analyze sentiment, and track industry trends across multiple social media platforms.

2. mention: mention helps you track mentions of your brand or industry on social media, blogs, forums, and news outlets. you can also measure sentiment and track the effectiveness of your marketing campaigns.

3. brandwatch: brandwatch provides real-time social media monitoring and analytics, allowing you to track conversations about your brand or industry across multiple channels.

4. talkwalker: talkwalker enables you to monitor social media, news outlets, blogs, forums, and other online sources. the tool provides social listening and analytics, as well as customized reports and alerts.

5. awario: this tool has sentiment analysis features and can track mentions of your industry on social media, blogs, and forums to provide insights into customer opinions and trends.

these are just a few examples. it's important to research different options and choose a tool that's best suited to your specific needs and budget.
